scripts.contentful:dev:export: dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-var contentful space export --content-file src/contentful/export-dev.json --management-token %CONTENTFUL_MANAGEMENT_API_ACCESS_TOKEN% --space-id %CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID% --environment-id %CONTENTFUL_ENVIRONMENT%
scripts.contentful:prod:export: dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var contentful space export --content-file src/contentful/export-prod.json --management-token %CONTENTFUL_MANAGEMENT_API_ACCESS_TOKEN% --space-id %CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID% --environment-id %CONTENTFUL_ENVIRONMENT%
scripts.contentful:dev:import-prod: dotenv -e .env.local -- cross-var contentful space import --content-file src/contentful/export-prod.json --management-token %CONTENTFUL_MANAGEMENT_API_ACCESS_TOKEN% --space-id %CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID% --environment-id %CONTENTFUL_ENVIRONMENT%
scripts.contentful:prod:import-dev: dotenv -e .env.prod -- cross-var contentful space import --content-file src/contentful/export-dev.json --management-token %CONTENTFUL_MANAGEMENT_API_ACCESS_TOKEN% --space-id %CONTENTFUL_SPACE_ID% --environment-id %CONTENTFUL_ENVIRONMENT%
